mapper.select:
SELECT a.ifdaSeq , a.ifdaContents , a.ifdaRegDate , b.ifmmSeq , b.ifmmID
, c.path AS diaryPath , c.uuidName AS diaryuuidName
, d.path AS memberPath , d.uuidName AS memberuuidName , (
SELECT COUNT( * ) FROM likebtn li WHERE li.postSeq = a.ifdaSeq AND clickUser = #{loginUser} AND likeType = 1 ) AS like_ing , (
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likebtn li WHERE li.postSeq = a.ifdaSeq AND likeType = 1 ) likeCount , (
SELECT COUNT( * ) FROM comment co WHERE co.da_ifdaSeq = a.ifdaSeq ) AS commentCount FROM diary a JOIN member b ON a.mm_ifmmSeq = b.ifmmSeq JOIN diaryUploaded c ON c.pseq = a.mm_ifmmSeq JOIN memberUploaded d ON d.pseq = a.mm_ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifdaSeq = c.seq ORDER BY a.ifdaSeq DESC
SELECT a.seq ,a.path AS diaryPath ,a.uuidName AS diaryuuidName ,b.ifdaSeq FROM diaryUploaded a JOIN diary b ON a.seq = b.ifdaSeq WHERE 1=1 AND pseq = #{ifmmSeq}

SELECT a.ifdaSeq , a.mm_ifmmSeq , d.ifmmID , a.ifdaContents , a.ifdaRegDate , b.path AS diaryPath , b.uuidName AS diaryuuidName , c.path AS memberPath , c.uuidName AS memberuuidName FROM diary a JOIN diaryUploaded b ON a.mm_ifmmSeq = b.pseq JOIN memberUploaded c ON a.mm_ifmmSeq = c.pseq JOIN member d ON a.mm_ifmmSeq = d.ifmmSeq WHERE a.ifdaSeq = b.seq AND a.mm_ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
SELECT mm.ifmmSeq ,mm.ifmmID ,mmup.path ,mmup.uuidName FROM member mm JOIN memberUploaded mmup ON mm.ifmmSeq = mmup.pseq WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{loginUser}

SELECT mm.* ,b.path AS memberPath ,b.uuidName AS memberuuidName ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary di WHERE mm.ifmmSeq = di.mm_ifmmSeq ) AS postCount ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow fw WHERE mm.ifmmSeq = fw.iffwFollow ) AS follow ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow fw WHERE mm.ifmmSeq = fw.iffwFollower ) AS follower FROM member mm JOIN memberUploaded b ON mm.ifmmSeq = b.pseq WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}

SELECT di.* ,mm.ifmmID ,diup.path AS diPath ,diup.uuidName AS diuuidName ,mmup.path AS mmPath ,mmup.uuidName AS mmuuidName ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likebtn li WHERE li.postSeq = di.ifdaSeq ) AS likeCount FROM diary di JOIN diaryUploaded diup ON di.mm_ifmmSeq = diup.pseq JOIN memberUploaded mmup ON di.mm_ifmmSeq = mmup.pseq JOIN member mm ON di.mm_ifmmSeq = mm.ifmmSeq WHERE di.ifdaSeq = diup.seq AND di.ifdaSeq = #{ifdaSeq}
